encyclopedia.content: Loquat枇杷乐队 简介： 1996年，吉他手兼歌手Kylee Swenson 在圣弗朗西斯科遇到Earl Otsuka 时，就要料想到Loquat的成立了，在2001年的时候贝司手Andrew Gordon、鼓手Christopher Lautz, 和后来的键盘手Ryan Manley的加入终于有了现在规模的Loquat。

means.word_mean: 1. evergreen tree of warm regions having fuzzy yellow olive-sized fruit with a large free stone; native to China and Japan
2. yellow olive-sized semitropical fruit with a large free stone and relatively little flesh; used for jellies

auth_sentence.content: Take "I Count the Ways, " the album's first single, featuring Kylee Swenson of the San Francisco electronica-pop group Loquat.
